Damhee

Korean: 담희

Hometown:

Daegu

South Korea

Park Dam-hee
Native name:
박담희
Birthday:
Jun 21, 2000
Age:
24 years old
Group (2016-present):
ARTBEAT v until May 12, 2023

Introduction

Damhee is a South Korean singer and dancer under AB Creative, member of the girl group ARTBEAT and the co-ed dance crew ARTBEAT. She joined the agency AB Creative in 2020 or earlier where she was active as a dancer in their dance group 'AB' (also called AB Project) and also as a soloist dance performer.
